verses.verse: And the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the leaders, <S%H5387><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

and they said, <S%H559><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> as an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and my lord <S%H113><s%> was commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> to his daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

"But if they marry <S%H1961><s%> <S%H802><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the [other] tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> will be withdrawn <S%H1639><s%> from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of our fathers and will be added <S%H1><s%> to the inheritance <S%H3254><s%> of the tribe <S%H5159><s%> to which <S%H4294><s%> they belong; <S%H834><s%> thus it will be withdrawn <S%H1961><s%> from our allotted <S%H1639><s%> inheritance. <S%H1486><s%>

"And when <S%H518><s%> the jubilee <S%H3104><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> comes, <S%H1961><s%> then their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> will be added <S%H3254><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> they belong; <S%H1961><s%> so their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> will be withdrawn <S%H1639><s%> from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of our fathers."

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> are right <S%H9210><s%> in [their] statements. <S%H1696><s%>

"This <S%H2088><s%> is what <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> concerning the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Let them marry <S%H1961><s%> <S%H802><s%> whom they wish <S%H2896><s%>; <S%H5869><s%> only <S%H389><s%> they must marry <S%H1961><s%> <S%H802><s%> within the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their father.'

"Thus no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be transferred <S%H5437><s%> from tribe <S%H4294><s%> to tribe, <S%H4294><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall each <S%H376><s%> hold <S%H1692><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of his fathers.

"And every <S%H3605><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> who comes <S%H3423><s%> into possession <S%H3423><s%> of an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of any <S%H4480><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall be wife <S%H802><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of her father, so <S%H1><s%> that the sons <S%H4616><s%> of Israel <S%H1121><s%> each <S%H3478><s%> may possess <S%H376><s%> the inheritance <S%H3423><s%> of his fathers.

"Thus no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall be transferred <S%H5437><s%> from one tribe <S%H4294><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> tribe, <S%H4294><s%> for the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall each <S%H376><s%> hold <S%H1692><s%> to his own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>"
Just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> did: <S%H6213><s%>

Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Tirzah, <S%H8656><s%> Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> and Noah, <S%H5270><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> married <S%H802><s%> their uncles' sons. <S%H1121><s%>

They married <S%H802><s%> [those] from the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> remained <S%H1961><s%> with the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of their father.

These <S%H428><s%> are the commandments <S%H4687><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> [opposite] Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
